bibl.title: An Ancient Christian Hymn with Musical Notation. Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 1786: Text and Commentary

series.title: Studien und Texte zu Antike und Christentum

bibl.seg: Charles H. Cosgrove, An Ancient Christian Hymn with Musical Notation. Papyrus Oxyrhynchus 1786: Text and Commentary = Studien und Texte zu Antike und Christentum. 65.
Tübingen, Mohr Siebeck, 2011, 8°, xii-232 pp. ISBN 978-3-16-150923-0. €69.

P. Oxy. XV, 1786 (= LDAB 5403; van Haelst 962). - Chapter One: Introduction. - Chapter Two: Text and Musical Notation. - Chapter Three: Interpretation of the Text. - Chapter Four: Formal and Rhetorical Analysis. - Chapter Five: Musical Analysis. - Chapter Six: Social Setting. - Appendix: Pich Centers and Tonal Structure in Ancient Greek Melodies. - Discography. Works Cited. Indexes.
C.R. par Don Barker, CR N.S., 63 (2013) pp. 95-97. - Matteo Agnosini, Eikasmos 25 (2014) pp. 481-485.
